0: As for you… Some travellers say, that saw your dusty figure on the Northern tract, travelling alongside several scientists and merchants
9.97582: Mercenaries, on the other hand, claim they saw you with troops, completing unknown objectives in the deadly Wastes
18.52652: Drunker stalkers, on the other hand, swear that you helped them rummage through ancient ruins
25.65211: There are lots of stories… But which ones are true? Only time will tell
